original: Abhinimmito jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
analyzed: abhinimmitaḥ jinaḥ satthā sammāsambuddhaḥ sabbaññū sabba dassāvī dhamma ssāmī dhamma ppaṭisaraṇaḥ ti

original: Āyasmā ānando jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ jinaḥ satthā sammāsambuddhaḥ sabbaññū sabba dassāvī dhamma ssāmī dhamma ppaṭisaraṇaḥ ti
saṅkhittena api kho aha sāriputta dhammam deseyya

original: vitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
analyzed: vitthārena api kho aha sāriputta dhammam deseyya

original: saṅkhittavitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
analyzed: saṅkhitta vitthārena api kho aha sāriputta dhammam deseyya

original: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
analyzed: tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammaḥ desitaḥ iti
abhiññāya aha bhikkhave dhammam desemi no an abhiññāya

original: sanidānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no anidānaṁ;
analyzed: sa nidānā aha bhikkhave dhammam desemi no a nidāna

original: sappāṭihāriyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ;
analyzed: sappāṭihāriya aha bhikkhave dhammam desemi no appāṭihāriya

original: tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dhammaṁ desayato no anabhiññāya, sanidānaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave abhiññāya dhammaṃ desayataḥ no an abhiññāya sa nidānam dhamma

original: desayato no anidānaṁ, sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desayato no appāṭihāriyaṁ karaṇīyo ovādo karaṇīyā anusāsanī;
analyzed: desayataḥ no sappāṭihāriyam dhammam desayataḥ no appāṭihāriyam karaṇīyaḥ ovādaḥ karaṇīyā anusāsanī

original: alañca pana vo, bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā alaṁ attamanatāya alaṁ somanassāya—
analyzed: alam ca pana vaḥ bhikkhave tuṭṭhiyā alam atta manatāya alam somanassāya

original: sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ dhammo su paṭipanno saṅghaḥ iti

original: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne dasasahassilokadhātu akampitthā”ti.
analyzed: imasmin ca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne dasa sahassi lokadhātu akampittha ati

original: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
analyzed: tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammaḥ desitaḥ iti
